content:
Certainly! Here is a revised version of the Lord's Prayer in rhyme form, based on the version in the Sermon on the Mount in the book of Matthew in the Bible:

Our Father, who art in heaven,
Hallowed be thy name, so heaven.
Thy kingdom come, thy will be done,
On earth as it is in heaven, so won.
Give us this day our daily bread,
And forgive us our debts, as we have said.
As we have forgiven those who have wronged,
Lead us not into temptation, but from evil, stay strong.

Amen.
